CONTRACT_ID: ITT-EB144-241022 -Caisson Concrete Repairs, Canso Canal, NS
description: Restoration of keyways between caissons and repairs of copewall between caissons
full_summary:
## Invitation to Tender: Caisson Concrete Repairs, Canso Canal, NS

### Bid Opportunity Summary

* Reference Number: WS4232144663-Doc4232237681
* Solicitation Number: WS4232144663
* Amendment Number: 3
* Tender Status: Cancelled
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Project Details

* Location: Canso Canal, Nova Scotia
* Deliverables:
	+ Restoration of keyways between caissons below water as shown on the drawings
	+ Repairs of copewalls between caissons above water as shown on the drawings
	+ Supply and installation of new ladders complete with hardware as shown on the drawings
* Estimated Contract Value: $1,000,001 to $5,000,000 (HST included)
* Contract Duration: 21 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer

### Tender Documents

* All tender documents are available online at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17576698?extsite=MTc1NzY2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17576698?extsite=MTc1NzY2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* Bidders may submit their proposals in either official language of Canada (English or French).

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Sonia Stockman, sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note that the original text was poorly written and had grammar errors. I made the following changes:

* Rewrote the text in a more formal and professional tone.
* Organized the information into headings and subheadings for better readability.
* Standardized the format of the bid opportunity summary.
* Removed unnecessary information and focused on the essential details of the project.
* Corrected grammatical errors and improved sentence structure.
* Provided a clear and concise description of the project and its requirements.
